### üîß How it Works

This workflow converts the NPR Sponsorship Service API into an MCP-compatible interface for AI agents.

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **HTTP Request Nodes**: Handle API calls to https://sponsorship.api.npr.org

‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Returns responses directly to the AI agent
